xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/792306-Burning Britain: The History of UK Punk 1980-1984 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4yMyQMerpNy5Rny7Sgo152pjfVl.jpg The History of UK Punk 1980-1984. A mix of promo videos and, in many cases, extremely rare live material from the likes of The Exploited, GBH, The Destructors, Peter & The Test Tube Babies, and many others. The DVD documents the raw passion and creativity that fired the UK punk scene during the first half of the 1980s Burning Britain: The History of UK Punk 1980-1984
